text: Arlene Francis (or Arline Francis Kazanjian; October 20, 1907 â€“ May 31, 2001) was an American actress and radio talk show host. She hosted What's My Line? from 1950 to 1975. She was also a stage performer. Francis was born in New York City. She died in San Francisco from Alzheimer's disease caused by cancer. ==References== Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Cancer deaths in San Francisco Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:1907 births Category:2001 deaths
title: Arlene Francis
